column2:
"That was masterful work.
It looks like you're getting
closer to your culmination as a Hunter."

"If you're such a master, it'd be better if
you experience it yourself in battle
rather than discussing theory."
"Would you join me in training your ability to work with others by heading to the deepest hinterlands of Naberius?"

"その熟達した動き。
ハンターとしての極致へと
着実に近づきつつあるようだな。"

"そこまでの使い手になったならば
もはや理論で語るよりも、戦場での
感覚に身を任せるほうがいいだろう。"

"共にナベリウス最奥の地へと向かい
他者との連携行動を練習しないか？"
